user.title: Set up Tasmanian Transport
user.description:
Configure your bus stop for real-time departure tracking.

**About Stop IDs:**
Stop IDs consist of your postcode followed by three digits (e.g., 7109023 for postcode 7109).

**To find your stop ID:**
1. Visit the [Tasmanian Transport website]({transport_site_url})
2. Search for your bus stop
3. Copy the ID from the URL

**Example:** For stop 7109023, you'll see it in the URL like: .../#?stop=7109023

filters.title: Configure Filters (Optional)
filters.description:
Filter departures to show only specific bus routes or destinations. This is optional - leave blank to show all departures from {stop_name}.

**Examples:**
- Route filters: X58,457,401
- Destination filters: Mount Nelson,University,Sandy Bay

{examples}

data_description.line_filters: Filter by specific bus route numbers, separated by commas (e.g., X58,457,401)
data_description.destination_filters: Filter by the final destination which is displayed in Tas Transport (e.g., Mount Nelson,University)
data_description.filter_mode: Show only matching routes/destinations (Include) or hide matching ones (Exclude)
